name: Tumblr Dashboard - Space nebula with Fixed Sidebar
description:
this theme is an updated version of my earlier release - space nebula.

features:
+ transparant dashboard border
+easy to read text
+great for bright displays
+**FIXED SIDEBAR**

try it out, see what you think, and leave your comments or thoughts of it in my ask box @ http://1000tomorrows-themes.tumblr.com/

tumblr: http://1000tomorrows-themes.tumblr.com/
